name: cordova-plugin-qrscanner-tests
description: Cordova tests for the cordova-plugin-qrscanner package

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf platforms && rm -rf plugins
scripts.test:ios: cordova prepare ios && cordova build ios && open platforms/ios/CvQRScnTst.xcodeproj
scripts.test:android: cordova build android && open -a /Applications/Android\ Studio.app platforms/android
